Uses of Class
trains.Place

    • Uses of Place in trains

      Methods in trains that return Place 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Place Place.clone()
      Returns an identical copy of this Place object
      Place PetriMap.getPlace(int index)
      Gets the Place located at a particular index
      Place PetriMap.getPlace(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the place that matches a particular name
      Constructors in trains with parameters of type Place 
      Constructor and Description
      PetriThread(Place place, PetriMap map, int[][] preMatrix, java.util.ArrayList<Transition> eventsBuffer)
      Customised thread constructor that pre-loads all transitions out-linked to the place parameter using the preMatrix.
